nodes.text: Star Wars: Jedi Battles is a Star Wars Legends young-readers reference book. It was published by DK Publishing on December 23, 2013.

Featuring the most exciting duels and epic battles that have ever been fought in the Star Wars galaxy, DK Adventures: Star Wars: Jedi Battles will show you lightsaber techniques, deadly weapons, other-world allies, and just how the Jedi succeed in battle.
Good books build great readers. Created in consultation with literacy experts, DK Adventures will appeal to proficient readers who have a love of reading for both information and pleasure.

With rich, descriptive vocabulary, and interactive elements including diaries, recipes, poetry, character profiles, diagrams, and articles to support the stories, DK Adventures focus on engaging, action-packed topics that will develop comprehension skills and continue to build a child's love of reading.
The book uses the cut-away for the Millennium Falcon used in Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections. It also erroneously states that the X-wing is built by Kuat Systems Engineering.
